text.headline: The Great Divergence
text.text: The timeline of Nouvelle Terre diverges from the Old World in 1337, during the Hundred Years War. Here, France achieves a decisive victory, changing the course of history forever.

text.headline: Ebreinian colonisation of Z'verto
text.text: Many have tried, but few had as much success as the Ebreinians did. Isn't that right, Iberia?

media.caption: The only armed conflict they fought against each other.

text.headline: The 30-Minutes War
text.text: The shortest conflict in the history of Nouvelle Terre. And probably the least violent too.

text.headline: First World War
text.text: The first world war Nouvelle Terre has ever experienced, and perhaps one of the biggest domino effect in its history. Notable for the first usage of a war machine like the tank.

text.headline: Iberia Is Proclaimed
text.text: Shortly after Portugal is annexed, the military governor Marrero proclaims the new state of Iberia.

text.headline: Third World War
text.text: The most destructive yet. And probably motivated by pure pettiness.

media.caption: No one knew what was coming.

text.headline: Global Food Shortage
text.text: A worldwide famine caused by the destructive Third World War.

text.headline: Fourth World War
text.text: The precursor to the Global Hunger Crisis yet caused by the Global Food Shortage. Nations try to gain arable land to feed their populations.

text.headline: Franco-German War
text.text: The war that shook Nouvelle Terre to its core, resulting in a stalemate and the unexpected revival of the Holy Roman Empire. France needed land as much as Germany did. But they fought for so many times now...

text.headline: Global Hunger Crisis
text.text: A worldwide famine sparks desperation among nations, pushing the world closer to the brink of another global war.

text.headline: The Second Ebreinian Republic is Born
text.text: A new Constitution causes the entire administration of Ebrein to reorganise, therefore giving birth to a new Republic.

text.headline: The tank is first used in war
text.text: The first recorded usage of the tank, it has possibly been in development since 1880 in Ebrein.

text.headline: Spanish coup
text.text: General Marrero orchestrates a coup against the weakened Spanish government, and succesfully overthrows the Spanish monarchy, which marks the beginning of Marrero's Spain.

media.caption: Flag of the Second Republic of Ebrein.

text.headline: Fourteen Days of Terror
text.text: Huge protests in Laurae (Ladora) following the arrestation of the Ebreinian opposition turn extremely brutal.
